value: No pro se plaintiffs or defendants
description: A legal case in which both the plaintiffs and defendants are represented by licensed attorneys, with no parties acting on their own behalf (without legal representation).

value: Pro se plaintiffs, but no pro se defendants
description: The plaintiff is representing themselves (acting without a lawyer), while the defendant is represented by an attorney in the case.

value: Pro se defendants, but no pro se plaintiffs
description: The defendant is acting without legal representation (pro se), while the plaintiff is represented by an attorney in the case.
Both parties in the case (plaintiffs and defendants) representing themselves without legal counsel, with neither side having an attorney.
